name: The strange dream of Trent
description:
In The Strange dream of Trent you have 2 game-mehanics, which help you to survive from onslaught of woodcutters. Be careful and pick up all leaves on your route to heal you up and continue playing game. The second mechanic is tree mode, when Trent transforming to static tree and become invisible for woodcutters. The main goal of game to escape from the park. Have fun! Your ROG (Republic of Games) team.

ROG (Republic of Games) Team members:

1) @raynelz - game designer.

2) @Zarubaka - 3d artist.

3) @borbos - developer.

4) @Ven4ikkk - 3d artist.

5) @bonki2004 - developer.

6) @thd - 3d artist.
